Banner.Description: I am a self-taught programmer pivoting from leading investigations at Apple to pursue my passions in Software Engineering. I've been developing for 4 years and am currently a full-time student studying Computer Science graduating December 2024. I love helping people and I build tools using Python, Javascript, Machine Learning, and Cloud.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 4 years developing software, I’ve made life easier for teammates at Apple and Dell, while spending my free time coding tools to amplify the efforts of the Center for Child Protection, local artists, underpriveledged students, and I’m currently working on a tool to help mental health professionals.

My leadership skills have been honed through mentorship gained from 6 years leading projects at Apple, leading two student clubs with IEEE and Google, and founding a startup. My software skills can be attributed to research scholarships allowing me to contribute to the fields of Resilient Systems and Machine Learning.
My goal is to improve my software engineering skills so I can help more people.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineering Intern
Description: Contributed to the engineering team that owns all order processes between Dell.com and our global factories
Saved our LATAM team over 30 hours per week by programming a bulk-order script for a common order block
Improved accessibility of my solution by converting it from Python to Typescript/Angular/Node
Wrote unit and integration tests while contributing to an Agile team environment using Git

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineering Intern
Description: Programmed 4 ETL data pipelines for Europe and Asia markets, resulting in improved reliability and up-to-dateness of the database holding 300 million customer records, impacting both data strategy and sales teams
Conducted thorough testing and worked with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless deployment
Won the annual intern hackathon by automating a complex business process

Experience.Jobs.Title: Machine Learning Researcher
Description: Investigated the effects of using a Convolutional Neural Network to augment image datasets

Achieved custom image augmentation by writing Python code to read images, convert them to tensors, and augment them using random combinations of overexcited concatenation layers of the InceptionV3 CNN
Automated the data processing and model training using 8 Nvidia GPUs in parallel on a remote Linux server

Experience.Jobs.Title: Teaching Assistant
Description: Taught students how to design, code, and deploy full stack applications with a Senior Software Engineer from Meta's Engineer In Residence Program.
Saved hundreds of work hours by writing unit tests in Python to automate grading

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineering Researcher
Description: Automated an intelligent, solar-powered, aquaponic farm using 7 microcomputers.
Published peer-reviewed articles and presented at 4 Conferences.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Fraud Specialist
Description: Taught myself Python and Javascript to automate my role and take on more responsibilities
Saved Apple $1Billion every year by coaching and training a team of 140 fraud investigators
Prepared for and conducted investigations often involving personal interviews of criminals
Led over 250 volunteer events to connect employees with nonprofits by directing a team of 50 Apple volunteer leaders

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu super plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I'm happy to work together on projects or learn about job opportunities or collaborate on volunteer projects that make the world a better place.
